attributes.action: Give Iran an ultimatum to return the illegally held British Servicemen and woman or to face the proposition of armed conflict with the United Kingdom and its allies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The United Kingdom has been very patient and diplomatic in dealing with Iran in this issue. The ruling parties of Iran have clearly shown total disrespect towards the UK in this matter and now needs to be shown that this type of behavior will not be tolerated against the UK or for that matter any other country. Therefore, I ask that the Prime Minister try one more time to solve this matter by diplomatic means and should that fail military options should prevail.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
